channel.title: +MT on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +MT on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: ahUra puruSha
item.description: Via MT The samanid official Ahmad al-Jayhani while a Mohammedan was suspected by some of his coreligionists to be a cryptic Manichaeist. He preserves an interesting Iranic fragment that we as practitioners of sister religion can immediately see cognancy with. The god Ahura Mazdha says: I created the whole of this world from myself. I created the souls of the righteous from the hair of my head; the sky from my brain; nails & arms (?
